short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A better proofreading tool. This is for non-native speakers who have to use English in their work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When I built a landing page, I needed to proofread the text. (If you are a non-native writer and you want to present something in English, proofreading is a must. Native speakers will sense that you are a non-native writer and say your text needs proofreading.) I wanted a software for proofreading. I tested out the proofreading tools available, but I wasnâ€™t content with them. So, I decided to make a new one, using my skills as an AI engineer.
